programme.title: The Musical History of Lucas Haneman
programme.desc: We tell the story of Lucas Haneman, a musician who is blind, and hear the magic he makes with his guitar.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP06) Detective Murdoch investigates the death of one of Dr. Julia Ogden's phobia patients. But can Murdoch overcome his own phobia to solve the case? Guest star: Tara Spencer-Nairn
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP32) Pour le 40ème anniversaire de la Fondation MIRA on parle de sa mission permettant d'améliorer la vie des personnes aveugles. On s'entretient avec notre chroniqueur littéraire M. Cousineau.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP06) In this episode: Parenting with a disability. Surgery leaves a father of five partially paralyzed; find out how he and his wife navigate this new reality.
Année : 2008

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
(S01EP08) For many with facial difference, life can be difficult. We meet Canadians who open our heart and eyes to what it's like to live with a face that looks different.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP04) Things are getting flaky as pie expert Wanda Beaver joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:

Année : 2008

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:

Année : 2008

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Teenager Mac Denniston nearly lost his life in a mountain bike accident. The crash left him with a Traumatic Brain Injury, but 18 months on he's making remarkable progress.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dr Huhana Hickey is a key figure in the disability community. She's organising a hikoi to seek a better future for the next generation - and marking her life story with a moko kauae.
Année : 2011

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP12) Coal Valley is finally going to get some justice for the mine explosion when Circuit Judge Jedidiah Black comes to town. Jack confronts Elizabeth about her teaching offer. Jack and Elizabeth's relationship changes in a big way.
Année : 2014
Réalisation : Neill Fearnley
Scénario : Neal Dobrofsky
Avec : Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen) Chad Willett (Adam Miller) Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) James Brolin (Judge Jedidiah Black) Loretta Walsh (Florence Blakeley) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux)

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
